writer.name: Christopher Liam Moore Christopher Liam Moore

director.name: Christopher Liam Moore Christopher Liam Moore

introduction: What promises to be a stormy night of fun, costumes, and pranks turns deadly when a group of high school seniors, who are staging an elaborate senior prank, find themselves trapped on campus, tormented by someone from the town's dark past who's returned for bloody vengeance. One by one, the students disappear until only a few remain to battle the fiendish psychopath whose identity reveals a gruesome twist that no one could have ever suspected當一群正在上演精心策劃的高級惡作劇的高中生髮現自己被困在校園裡，被鎮上黑暗過去的人折磨，而這個人卻因流血而歸來時，這個充滿樂趣、服裝和惡作劇的暴風雨之夜變得致命。 復仇。 學生們一個接一個地消失，直到只剩下少數人與惡魔般的精神病患者作戰
